text: The canton of Laon-1 is an administrative division of the Aisne department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Laon.Décret n° 2014-202 du 21 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de l'Aisne It consists of the following communes: #Anizy-le-Grand #Aulnois-sous-Laon #Bassoles-Aulers #Besny-et-Loizy #Bourguignon-sous-Montbavin #Brancourt-en- Laonnois #Bucy-lès-Cerny #Cerny-lès-Bucy #Cessières-Suzy #Chaillevois #Chambry #Clacy-et-Thierret #Crépy #Laniscourt #Laon (partly) #Merlieux-et-Fouquerolles #Molinchart #Mons-en-Laonnois #Montbavin #Pinon #Prémontré #Royaucourt-et- Chailvet #Urcel #Vaucelles-et-Beffecourt #Vauxaillon #Vivaise #Wissignicourt ==References== Category:Cantons of Aisne
title: Canton of Laon-1
